snippet.title: Bentley's Hackpack Game Trailer
snippet.description:
Check out the PlayStation Network exclusive, Bentley's Hackpack! 

Featuring hacking mini-games from Sly Cooper: Thieves in Time™, step into the Arcade and play through multiple levels to bust open all the safes and unlock the most secret and secure item ever! Purchase the full game for the PS3 and PS Vita systems to get your hands on over 45 levels and 200 challenges!

www.slycooper.com

©2013 Sony Computer Entertainment America LLC. Bentley's Hackpack is a trademark of Sony Computer Entertainment America LLC. Developed by Sanzaru Games Inc.
